name: angvik
summary: Angvik is a platform action game set in a joyful but unforgiving land. The castle has been taken over by a barbarian and no one else has the courage to confront him, so take up your father’s gear and set off on a wondrous journey! And you’re not alone: you’ll find many birds and items to aid you along the way, and you’ll encounter all sorts of creatures to fight as well. But watch your step! You have only one life, so if you die, you stay dead.
info:
• 中文名: 昂维克
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2013-6-11
  • 售价: $2.99
  • 官方网站: http://angvik.us/
